title: Womens Dress
title_original: Ferand Women's Cozy Striped Faux Fur Poncho Sweater Soft Fuzzy Shawl for Winter

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #265,496 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,445 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shawl soft and warm, with good quality fabric. They appreciate its versatility, noting it looks great with both casual and classy outfits, and one customer mentions it can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft
items.body: Got this poncho for my daughter‘s Christmas concert. The quality of the fabric is top notch. The poncho is very soft and warm. You can wear it any day of the year. Definitely need to buy more. Read more
items.author: Paige

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft!
items.body: I'm loving this soft faux fur shawl. Looks great with a casual or classy outfit. Even with my broader shoulders it fits well and not to snug. Great quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Amanda Hansen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, beautiful and silky soft on top side, I don't like the underside.
items.body: I got the grey. The reasons I got this was a) I HATE having to roll my sleeves up when I'm at a sink (wash face, do dishes etc.) as they always fall down. I wanted something warm and cozy - no hassle to wear. Also, to wear it at work when I feel a bit of tummy bloat or just want to be cuddly. What I have found thus far, exterior is fabulous. I don't know what it will be like after a washing, but while it's new, it's delightful. I'm 5.2 curvy, and it fits me perfectly but I think it would fit a large range of sizes. The bias cut allows me to raise my hands and the material stays closer to the body, so no issue washing my hands. The collar is devine! It's of course faux fur and it is just perfect to keep my throat, chin warm etc. You will want to pull it up over your face it's so soft. Now, the only compliant I have is that I guess I didn't notice the underside. I really thought the underside would be soft and some fuzzy warm material too - but it's not. It's just some rayon or some material that I'm not crazy about, but I guess it helps with not sticking to your clothing. I really don't like the underside at all. I don't even like the touch of it (that's just me). So despite my one complaint, it's really very nice. If the underside was say fleece, then it would be truly dreamy. It can be dressed up or down. Some shiny jewelry would look very nice. Or maybe a Christmas broach. Still worth the buy! (I'm just particular.) I would give it 10 stars if it wasn't for the underside. I may still buy another color. ****IF YOU ARE SHOPPING FOR THIS OR SIMILAR, WHATEVER YOU DO PLEASE DO NOT BUY THE ONES MADE FROM BUNNIES/RABBIT FUR. THAT'S JUST SO CRUEL. Please save our sweet, innocent, animals from such cruelty. Read more
items.author: Chi-gurl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and good quality
items.body: Good quality, very soft, perfect for a gift, elegant and warm. Read more
items.author: Ely

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft outside, not on the inside
items.body: Outside is soft and smooth but inside is not. It is not cozy or warm on the inside. If it has some soft fabric on the inside it would have been perfect. Read more
items.author: B

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap
items.body: Cheap looking. Looks like you’re wearing an old wrinkled dog blanket. Read more
items.author: Anna

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Beige, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
